entry.title: Segregated witnesses and validationless mining
entry.summary: On December 28th, 2015, an IRC discussion took place regarding various updates related to Bitcoin. The discussion involved topics such as prior-block possession proofs, fraud proofs, non-fraud correctness proofs, commitments and segwit. A link to the discussion is provided in the email thread. The author of the email, Jorge Tim√≥n, requests for the link to the IRC discussion. The email was sent on January 2nd, 2016 at 10:37 AM. The signature of the email includes Bryan's personal website and phone number.
